webinars.title: 5 Strategic Priorities for Compensation Leaders in 2026
webinars.description: Join Charles Knuth, Product Marketing Lead, and Kristen Gomez, Customer Success Engineer, for an urgent session highlighting the five strategic priorities that separate winning compensation strategies from failing ones in 2026.

webinars.title: Preparing for 2026’s Talent Market: Compensation, Budget, and Hiring Trends
webinars.description: In this session, uncover what's actually happening in compensation with insights from Pave's real-time data and a new survey from Alpine Rewards.

webinars.title: Dropbox's Approach to Modernizing Compensation
webinars.description: Join our webinar and learn how Dropbox built a compensation engine that saved over 1,600 hours in their most recent cycle, while achieving 79% manager satisfaction.

webinars.title: AI Product Roadmap: The Path to Compensation Intelligence
webinars.description: Join Pave’s CEO & Founder Matt Schulman in conversation with our product leaders as we explore what’s next on the compensation intelligence roadmap.

webinars.title: Total Rewards Live 2025
webinars.description: Join Pave’s summit for total rewards and compensation leaders from innovative companies.

webinars.title: Benchmarking with Confidence: A Demo of the New Market Data
webinars.description: Join Pave's data experts for an overview of the revamped Market Data experience, and discover how these enhancements help you benchmark any role with confidence.

webinars.title: Scaling Smart: Databricks’ Compensation Strategy for Hypergrowth
webinars.description: A scalable compensation strategy is critical to maintaining hypergrowth momentum.

webinars.title: The Merit Cycle State of the Union
webinars.description: Dive into the aggregate trends and findings from merit cycles run by Pave’s community in 2025.

webinars.title: Demo: Interpreting Cycle Insights
webinars.description: In this demo, we'll show you how Pave's new enhancements to our Compensation Planning tool give planners a clear, real-time view of all cycle activity.

webinars.title: Demo: Unlocking Better Equity Benchmarks
webinars.description: Discover the science behind Pave's Calculated Benchmarks feature, and how this update will ensure more granular equity benchmarks for every role in Pave’s dataset.

webinars.title: How Expensive is AI/ML Talent?
webinars.description: Learning talent.

webinars.title: Market Pricing: From Pains to Process
webinars.description: Join Andrea De Ville, Strategic Community Lead at Pave, in conversation with Evan Salisbury, Head of Total Rewards at Ancestry, and Kaylyn Reid, Head of Total Rewards & Analytics at GoFundMe, as they tackle key pricing pain points and share the strategies helping their businesses save time and resources, and ultimately build trust with the business.

webinars.title: The Equity Landscape: Shifting Strategies to Manage Equity Spend
webinars.description: Join Matt Schulman, Pave CEO & Founder, in conversation with David Knopping, Founder and Managing Director of Alpine Rewards, as they dig into the data behind what companies are doing to execute on equity more efficiently.

webinars.title: How to use Offer Insights to stay ahead of the talent curve
webinars.description: Join our panel of leaders who helped launch Offer Insights, for a conversation on how to leverage offer data to gain a competitive edge.

webinars.title: Perfecting Your Market Pricing
webinars.description: Join our panel of compensation experts for a conversation on what it takes to build a streamlined and efficient compensation band refresh process.

webinars.title: Ditching Spreadsheets for Pave’s Compensation Planning: A Fireside Chat with Revolution Medicines
webinars.description: joined the Revolution Medicines Total Rewards team, she was immediately focused on setting up the right systems to support scale.

webinars.title: Strategies to Build Trust in Compensation Cycles
webinars.description: In this webinar, Natan Lee-Engel, Implementations Lead, and Robert Friedland, Head of Sales Engineering, from Pave share what it takes to drive buy-in and build confidence in compensation cycles at every angle.

webinars.title: Connecting Performance and Compensation: How to Have an Effective Conversation
webinars.description: In this webinar, we sit down with leaders from Culture Amp and Pave to discuss managing effective compensation and performance conversations.

webinars.title: Product Tour: Compensation Planner
webinars.description: With inflation, leaner teams, and tighter budgets, there’s a lot at stake this merit cycle. Getting employees aligned on compensation decisions will be more important than ever. Run a seamless, data-driven merit cycle with Pave’s compensation planning and management platform.

webinars.title: Product Tour: Advanced Equity
webinars.description: Confidently manage your equity program with relevant, real-time benchmarks from Pave. Advanced Equity gives you insight into your peers’ equity practices and market changes so you can distribute equity in a way that’s competitive and responsible.

webinars.title: How to Navigate Today’s 3 Big Compensation Challenges
webinars.description: Learn how to navigate these challenges from Angela Rao, Director of Total Rewards at Drata, Rahim Bhayani, Field Compensation Advisory at Elastic, Renee Gardner, VP of Global Compensation at Snowflake, and Matt Schulman, CEO of Pave.

webinars.title: How CFOs and CPOs Collaborate: Setting and Managing Your Compensation Budget
webinars.description: One of the most important but difficult parts of building your People strategy is determining the right budget. You need to consider a range of factors including your compensation philosophy, your company goals, and the happiness of your employees. You’ll also need to factor in your planned promotions, hiring plan, and standard merit increases for strong performers. Spend too much and you’ll be hearing from your board or investors. Spend too little and you’ll have a retention issue. You need to strike the perfect balance. As People and Finance Leaders, it’s your responsibility to come to the table with a proposal that drives the best outcomes.

webinars.title: Equity in a Down Market
webinars.description: In a down market, there are new realities that People and Finance Leaders face when it comes to equity. First, you have to determine your plan in the very likely scenario that your equity value has changed over the past year or will change with an upcoming fundraise. Second, you also need to consider how to communicate equity changes to your employees. Determining when to share and how much to share will be essential in keeping your workforce confident with their total rewards packages and the company’s future. There’s a lot at stake – so we’ve brought in some equity experts to provide some tactical advice and answer your questions.

webinars.title: Navigating Comp and Performance in the New Transparency-first World
webinars.description: In this webinar, we’ll sit down with Alexis Merritt, VP of People at Pave and Thaddeus Rada-Bayne, Senior People Scientist at Culture Amp to discuss compensation and performance conversations in today’s increasingly transparent world.

webinars.title: How to Build Compensation Bands Using Real-Time Market Data
webinars.description: In this session, we’ll explain how salary bands should work, then show you how to pull in the right market data and use it to build salary bands for your entire team.
